testJob.name: Basic RAD Compress Test
testJob.description: This is a simple test to make sure that RAD Compression jobs work properly
testJob.jobXml: <Job> <jobType>320</jobType> <processType>320</processType> <jobId>compressTest</jobId> <parentUrl>None</parentUrl> <url>http://sporks.nhm.ku.edu/services/rad/experiments/x</url> <userId>CJ</userId> <matrix> <url>http://LmComputeTest/somePam/csv</url> </matrix> <sitesPresent> <site key="1" present="True" /> <site key="2" present="True" /> <site key="3" present="True" /> <site key="4" present="True" /> <site key="5" present="True" /> <site key="6" present="True" /> <site key="7" present="True" /> <site key="8" present="True" /> <site key="9" present="True" /> <site key="10" present="True" /> <site key="11" present="True" /> <site key="12" present="True" /> <site key="13" present="True" /> <site key="14" present="True" /> <site key="15" present="True" /> <site key="16" present="True" /> <site key="17" present="True" /> <site key="18" present="True" /> <site key="19" present="True" /> <site key="20" present="True" /> <site key="21" present="True" /> <site key="22" present="True" /> <site key="23" present="True" /> <site key="24" present="True" /> <site key="25" present="True" /> <site key="26" present="True" /> <site key="27" present="True" /> <site key="28" present="True" /> <site key="29" present="True" /> <site key="30" present="True" /> </sitesPresent> </Job>
